# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a detection pattern to detect different types of content on the pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: A string for the pattern to detect.
title: init(rawValue:)
